snippet: When Kiva Ford returns from his job as a glass blower for a pharmaceutical company, he usually takes up his hobby: making creations to sell at art shows or online.
lead_paragraph: When Kiva Ford returns from his job as a glass blower for a pharmaceutical company, he usually takes up his hobby: making creations to sell at art shows or online.

headline.main: Blow Glass Is Jersey City Man’s Preoccupation
